overview: A series of original stories tied together by white satin sheets.  A young girl services her boyfriend as they watch a stag film.  A maid is spied on by two peeping toms as she takes matters in her own hands on the bed she is making.  A honeymooner consummates her marriage in a motel room.  Two blonde motorists get a lift from a man with the titular sheets in the back of his truck.  Finally, one of the blondes attends a toga party in the sheets.
tagline: The Sexiest Things Happen... On White Satin
title: On White Satin
